lead_paragraph: The sergeant who died had been struck in the head, the authorities said, while the other was shot in the leg. The suspect was shot and killed.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Arielle Dollinger, J. David Goodman, James C. McKinley Jr., William K. Rashbaum and Nate Schweber, and research by Susan C. Beachy.
byline.original: By AL BAKER, ELI ROSENBERG and BENJAMIN MUELLER

headline.print_headline: Police Sergeant Fatally Shot in the Bronx; Another Is Injured
headline.main: Police Sergeant Fatally Shot in the Bronx; Another Is Injured

snippet: The sergeant who died had been struck in the head, the authorities said, while the other was shot in the leg. The suspect was shot and killed....
abstract: New York City law enforcement officials say Manuel Rosales, suspected of breaking into his estranged wife's apartment in Bronx, shot and killed Police Sergeant Paul J Tuozzolo, and wounded his partner, Police Officer Emmanuel Kwo; Rosales was also shot and killed during encounter.
